description: Loan amount must be between $1,000 and $1,000,000.
rule: LoanAmount should be a numeric value between 1000 and 1000000.

description: Interest rate must be between 0.01% and 25%.
rule: InterestRate should be a numeric value between 0.01 and 25.

description: Loan status must be one of the predefined categories: Approved, Rejected, Pending, or Closed.
Borrower age must be between 18 and 75 years.
rule: BorrowerAge should be a numeric value between 18 and 75.

description: Repayment date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format.
rule: RepaymentDate should be a valid date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

description: Country code must be a valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code (US, UK, IN, CA, AU).
Outstanding balance must be greater than or equal to zero.
rule: OutstandingBalance should be a numeric value greater than or equal to 0.
